# kwiksand
### an efficient, simple text engine
types text character by character

# Usage
```py
kwik(text, delay)
```
#### Parameters
`text`: the text you want to write.
`delay`: the delay between characters (s).


# Examples
#### Predefined Text
```py
kwik("hello", 0.5)
# will type "hello" with a 0.5s delay between characters
```
